layout.singingstanza: God's de -- sign, God's de -- sign; Look all a -- round us, it's eas -- y to find! God's de -- sign, God's de -- sign; Fills us with won -- der, we're wowed ev -- ery time!

lyrics.stanza: From the mountains to the seas: Flowers and bugs, rocks and grass, leaves and trees. God's design, we can see: In things great and small He created for me!
